title: Gamification-Based Online Mathematics Education Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical operations and problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Focused on solving practical math problems linked to adult learners' daily lives, enhancing engagement and autonomy through gamification in online environments

learning_goals: Learners voluntarily participate in math problem-solving tasks at least twice a month using gamification elements (points, levels, badges).
Learners solve complex real-life math problems with over 80% accuracy through collaborative missions.
Learners establish personalized math learning plans using resources acquired on a digital game board.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
